item.title: Test Two
item.description: This second test page! What does inline formatting look like? Does it look good? Let’s check. Here is a filename.txt. And here is anotherOne.css. Here’s one that’s also-a-link.html There we go, that’s better. {{ range .Pages }} <div class="section__item"> <div class="section__item-head"> <h4><a href="{{ .RelPermalink }}">{{ .Title }}</a></h4> <p class="section__item-period">{{ .Date.Format "Jan 2, 2006" }}</p> </div> <div class="section__item-content"> <div> <p class="section__item-description">{{ .Summary }}</p> <a href="{{ .RelPermalink }}" class="section__view-all">Read More ‚Üí</a> </div> </div> </div> {{ else }} <p>No posts found.

item.title: Test One
item.description: This is the first test page!

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Peter, a Software Engineer from Aotearoa New Zealand. I’ve recently moved to Montr√©al, Canada üçÅ having spent the past 5 years working for Trade Me in NZ. I’m passionate, friendly, and excited about building interesting systems that solve important problems. I’m currently learning French and spending a bit more time tinkering in small open source projects. In my spare time I play guitar and ski. I like podcasts, Studio Ghibli movies and making silly things in code for fun.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Work Senior Full Stack Developer‚Ä¢ Trade Me 2019 - 2025 Trade Me is New Zealand’s largest online marketplace, and 5th most visited website. My final role was working in the Marketplace team, building features for high-volume sellers. item.title: Now
item.description: I’m living in Canada now. This really is just a test to create this page.
